name: Bust of Louis XV
description: Bust of Louis XV; Mennecy Porcelain Manufactory (French, active 1735 - 1773); Mennecy, France; about 1750 - 1755; Soft-paste porcelain; 43.2 × 24.3 × 14.4 cm (17 × 9 9/16 × 5 11/16 in.); 84.DE.46; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Bust of Louis XV
